thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Test Your Smarts on...Stock-Market Cycles

author: Rob Curran
title: Test Your Smarts on...Stock-Market Cycles
text:
It has been a while since the last U.S. recession and a bear market in stocks, so investors can be forgiven for forgetting what tough times look like.
High time for a refresher.
Stock-market volatility is back with a vengeance, credit costs are rising steadily, and the prospects of a trade war are casting a shadow on economic forecasts. For...
